SPapp_info@sil.org Rename Title Recordings Back Translation Recordings Consultant Password Please enter the consultant password: Incorrect Password No stories found! The template folder does not contain story template folders. For example, the template folder for the English story \"Lost Coin\" should be stored in the templates folder. Afterwards, restart the app to load the story templates. Select the folder than has the story templates in it. This will be the "template folder" that holds the registration and translation files.
